title.en: 'Business is at a standstill' - Mali jihadists' fuel blockade hits the capital

excerpt.en: More than 300 petrol tankers make it to Bamako under military escort a week after pumps run dry.

title.en: 'One of the greatest things' - Nigeria's art innovators on display in London

excerpt.en: Nigerian Modernism at the Tate spotlights a compelling period in the West African country's history.

title.en: Somalia's president: They tried to kill me five times

excerpt.en: Somalia's President Hassan Sheikh Mohamud says he is a prime target of the Islamist group al-Shabab.
